	<article class="offer js-offer" data-offer-type="deal" data-offer-id="5834811" data-outlink="/out/offer/5834811/62b57e27552b31003ce5a5e95b56d5478c83697e/?ps=2&pageViewID=1557745682574785601545095cd950129308c159100&mi=bellaitalia.co.uk&ppc=&tl=deal&opi=mpx&inv=instore&pl=desktop&ss=merchant&pn=%2Fbellaitalia.co.uk" id="voucher-5834811" data-reveal-type="click" data-revision="2" data-button-text="Get Deal">
	<section class="offer__container has-merchant-logo">
		<div class="offer__content">
			<div class="media">
				<div class="media-img">
					
					<div class="js-open">
						<img src="/static/v10/images/merchant/logo/128px/1209_180501155552.png" alt="Bella Italia logo" class="offer__merchant-logo" />
					</div>
				</div>

				<div class="media-body">

								<aside class="about-module" id="about" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/WebPage">

	<div class="about-module__content">
		<h3 class="tp-big">About Bella Italia</h3>
		<meta itemprop="name" content="Bella Italia Vouchers 2019">
		<p class="tp-regular">Bella Italia is your little friendly and authentic Italian establishment on the high street that&#39;s so charming and wholesome you forget that it&#39;s a restaurant chain. Bella Italia welcomes everyone - families, couples, students, vegans, and vegetarians to enjoy their delicious menu of pasta, risotto, calzone or classic pizza, Italian specialities, lighter dishes, grill, salad and sides. With new dishes recently added, plus kids eat for £1 and a £5 breakfast menu, there&#39;s even more reasons to visit. Whether you&#39;re dining at a Bella Italia restaurant locally or wanting to enjoy your Bella meal at home through click and collect or takeaway, always try to get money off your main courses by seeing which Bella Italia vouchers are valid to use now in May2019on this page. Favourite us or bookmark to stay up to date.</p>

		
					<h3 class="tp-big">Last Updated</h3>
			<p class="tp-regular">
				<time itemprop="lastReviewed" datetime="2019-05-08">Wed 8th May 2019</time>
			</p>
		
		<h3 class="tp-big">Official Website</h3>
		<p class="tp-regular">
			<a href="//www.bellaitalia.co.uk" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">www.bellaitalia.co.uk</a>
		</p>

	</li>

 	<div class="faq-accordion">
		<div class="faq-accordion__header">
			<h3>FAQs</h3>
		</div>
		<ul class="accordion accordion__merchant-page">
							<li class="accordion__item">
					<input id="faq-toggle-1" type=checkbox>
					<label class="js-faq-label" for="faq-toggle-1"><span class="accordion__title">Other</span></label>
					<div class="accordion__content">
													<div class="faq-accordion__question">
								<h4>Where can I find Bella Italia discount codes?</h4>
								<div>
									<p>Visit the &lsquo;Offers&rsquo; section of the Bella Italia website to find out which special offers are currently available in your area. If you sign up for the email you&rsquo;ll get details of these promotions delivered straight to your inbox, and you can also bookmark this page so that it&rsquo;s easy to check back and find all the latest voucher codes.</p>


								</div>
							</div>
													<div class="faq-accordion__question">
								<h4>Does Bella Italia offer a student discount?</h4>
								<div>
									<p>&nbsp;</p>


<p>Yes, students can get a great deal at Bella Italia. There&rsquo;s 50% off pizza and pasta all day Monday-Wednesday, so you can get a taste of Italy for less. If you&rsquo;re in the mood for a celebration, students can also enjoy 2-4-1 cocktails from 12pm Monday-Wednesday. Simply enter your email on the Bella Italia website to get your student discount code, then show your NUS / Student ID card when you order.</p>


								</div>
							</div>
											</div>
				</li>
							<li class="accordion__item">
					<input id="faq-toggle-2" type=checkbox>
					<label class="js-faq-label" for="faq-toggle-2"><span class="accordion__title">Menu</span></label>
					<div class="accordion__content">
													<div class="faq-accordion__question">
								<h4>Does Bella Italia have a breakfast menu?</h4>
								<div>
									<p>Yes, most Bella Italia restaurants are open for breakfast. You can start your day with a hearty cooked breakfast, pancakes or frittata, all for just &pound;5 each.</p>


								</div>
							</div>
											</div>
				</li>
					</ul>
	</div>

	<div itemprop="step" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/HowToSection">
		<h3 itemprop="name" class="tp-big">How to Use Bella Italia Voucher Codes</h3>
		<div itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/HowToDirection">

				<li>Click the green Get Code button and copy the code.</li>
				<li>Double check the offer and any terms here first.</li>
				<li>Go to the brand's website which has opened for you in either another tab or window, or just click the website link.</li>
				<li>Shop! Add stuff to your basket and head to the checkout.</li>
				<li>Paste the code in the box and apply before you pay.</li>
				<li>That was easy. Where to shop next?</li>

																<h2 class="tp-big">Buyers Guides</h2>
											    
    <aside class="block list-module clearfix">
<article class="rich-content">
            <h3 class="tp-big">Delicious Italian Cuisine</h3>
        <a href="#" class="image-container ">
            <img data-lazy-src="/static/v10/images/buyersguide/italy_20170725111810_95_95_full_@1x.png" height="95" alt="" >
        </a>
        <p class="tp-regular">It has been a long week and the thought of rustling up something divine that will please one and all is simply unthinkable. Why bother sweating away in the kitchen when you can enjoy an Italian family feast that will put a smile on the face of everyone in the family? If you love the taste of Italy but can’t afford a family flight ticket to Puglia, then head to Bella Italia for a feast fit for a Queen!<br />
<br />
If you love Italian cuisine but don’t own a private jet then never fear as Bella Italia have a wide selection of Italian dishes for you to choose from. Why not start the feast with a fabulous sharing plate? The Antipasti Board is loaded with Italian meats and cheese with olives, pepperonata and bread to share. Prefer a plate to yourself? With treats like calamari, tempura king prawns, polpette meatballs, baked mushrooms and arancini on the menu you’ll be spoilt for choice.<br />
<br />
We love a divine dish of pasta and if you do too the Bella Italia is the place to potter to. Whether you like a creamy carbonara, a traditional beef ragu or fresh egg pasta tubes in a fiery tomato sauce, the options are plentiful. If you are steering clear of carbs then you will be happy to hear that you can swap any pasta for spiralised vegetable 'spaghetti' made with courgettes, carrots and golden beetroot!<br />
<br />
They also serve fresh and tasty pizzas, piping hot lasagne and Italian classics such as Gamberoni Risotto, Lamb Rosmarino and delicious healthy yet filling salads for hot summer days too.<br />
</p>
</article>
    </aside>
											    
    <aside class="block list-module clearfix">
<article class="rich-content">
            <h3 class="tp-big">Dine Out the Italian Way</h3>
        <a href="#" class="image-container ">
            <img data-lazy-src="/static/v10/images/buyersguide/bella_20170429090122_95_95_full_@1x.jpg" height="95" alt="" >
        </a>
        <p class="tp-regular">If you are tired of looking at recipes you’ll never bother cooking and eating ready meals why not opt for an affordable meal out instead? If you love visiting Italy but can’t afford the plane ticket just treat yourself to some tasty Italian fare at Bella Italia instead.<br />
<br />
We highly recommend you don a frock, slip on some heels and treat a loved one to a meal to remember. Start with a platter consisting of a selection of Italian hams and salami, Pecorino cheese, buffalo mozzarella, Italian olives, marinated courgettes, ciabatta, breadsticks, peperonata and black olive tapenade.<br />
<br />
For your main we recommend you try the Gamberoni Risotto. This creamy risotto of king prawns, spring onion, peas, lemon, garlic and chilli is a treat for the taste buds! If you prefer something a little more saintly then opt for the Insalata Verde Salmon. This delicious salad is a delightful mix of avocado, green beans, peas, cucumber, mixed leaves, spring onion, with salsa verde and pumpkin seed. Tempted?<br />
<br />
Finish your meal with a pudding to end all puddings. Choose from vanilla cheesecake, chocolate fondant or even cookie dough lava cake. What more could you ask for? <br />
<br />
With fantastic deals and savings to take advantage of this is a guilt-free feast so you will even have enough money to treat yourself to a quality glass of Italian wine.<br />
<br />
Nothing beats dining out so browse the menu online today and enjoy a meal to remember.<br />
</p>
</article>
    </aside>
												

		
				
	</section>

            				<aside class="block hints-and-tips tp-regular" >
				<h4 class="tp-big">Hints &amp; Tips</h4>

					<p class="tp-regular sub-text">Do you find you're going to Bella Italia every weekend? Here are some great tips to help you save more</p>
		
					<ul><li>Bella Italia often have some really great set menus available, you will have to pick your meal from a slightly smaller list of food but they are so&nbsp;tasty and can save you a lot.</li><li>Bella Italia don&#39;t just offer great dinner options but they are also a great place to go for lunch, there are even some great deals on Prosecco brunches so keep on the look out.&nbsp;</li><li>If you want to keep up to date on any news or any limited time offers make sure you are signed up to their newsletter.&nbsp;</li></ul>
			</aside>

	<script>
		window.bugsnagClient = bugsnag({
			apiKey: 'c66b60373c3116d02e2839d151214999',
			
			releaseStage: 'prod',

			autoCaptureSessions: true,
			notifyReleaseStages: ["preview","staging","prod"],
			metaData: {
				account: {
					authType: 'Anon',
					device: 'desktop'
				}
			},
			beforeSend: function (report) {
				if (report.errorMessage.indexOf('Loading chunk') === 0 || report.errorMessage.indexOf('Loading CSS chunk') === 0){
					return false;
				}
			}
		});
	</script>

			<script>
		/* Sets cookie for 390 days */
		var cookiePopupEl = document.getElementById('cookie-popup');
		if (cookiePopupEl instanceof HTMLElement) {
			var cookieVersion = '';
			if (cookiePopupEl.dataset && cookiePopupEl.dataset.cookieVersion) {
				cookieVersion = cookiePopupEl.dataset.cookieVersion;
			}
			var cookieValue = 'cookie_notice_version=' + cookieVersion;
			var cookieExpiry = new Date();
			cookieExpiry.setTime(cookieExpiry.getTime() + (390 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
			cookieExpiry = 'expires=' + cookieExpiry.toGMTString();
			var cookiePath = 'path=/';
			document.cookie = cookieValue + '; ' + cookieExpiry + ' ;' + cookiePath;
			/* Closes box */
			cookiePopupEl.querySelector('.btn').addEventListener('click', function () {
				cookiePopupEl.parentElement.removeChild(cookiePopupEl);
			});
		}
	</script>

    <script>
        window.onload = function () {
                        var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
            ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'stats.g.doubleclick.net/dc.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
        };
    </script>
